info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:43PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Rensselaer County through 515 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Sand Lake, or near East Greenbush, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Troy, East Greenbush, Berlin, Wyantskill, Averill Park, West Sand Lake, Wynantskill, North Greenbush, Sand Lake, Poestenkill, East Nassau, South Troy, Totem Lodge, East Poestenkill, North Stephentown, Albia, West Stephentown, Eastmor, Millers Corners and Taborton. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 10 and 9. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
